DOC.brief_summary: To test hypothesis effect either multiple deep intramuscular stimulation therapy [ ( DIMMST : trigger point deep dry needling ( TrP-DDN ) combine paraspinal deep intramuscular stimulation ( PDIMS ) needle rotation ( NR ) ] would effective placebo-sham treatment MPS DIMMST would effective LTrP-I improve pain relief , sleep quality , physical mental state patient .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Myofascial pain syndrome ( MPS ) ( define regional pain , normal neurologic examination , presence TrPs , taut band , tender point , pain characterize `` dull , '' `` achy , '' `` deep '' relevant MPS diagnosis . Additionally , palpable nodule , pain exacerbate stress , decrease range motion , ropiness muscle ) . Disability last three month : ( define one limitation active routine activity MPS : ( ) interference work , ( ii ) enjoyable activity , ( iii ) responsibilities home , ( iv ) relationship , ( v ) personal goal , ( vi ) think clearly , problem solving , concentrating , remember last three month ) . Women Age : 19 50 year Exclusion criterion Rheumatoid arthritis Fibromyalgia Previous surgery affect area Prior experience acupuncture Primary radiculopathy Current use psychotropic drug ( ilicits ) Habitual use antiinflammatory steroid .
